metadata.title: CVE-2023-52682 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: f2fs:fix to wait on block writeback for post_read case If inode is compressed,but not encrypted, it missed to call f2fs_wait_on_block_writeback() to waitfor GCed page writeback in IPU write path. Thread A GC-Thread - f2fs_gc -do_garbage_collect - gc_data_segment - move_data_block -f2fs_submit_page_write migrate normal cluster's block via meta_inode's pagecache - f2fs_write_single_data_page - f2fs_do_write_data_page -f2fs_inplace_write_data - f2fs_submit_page_bio IRQ - f2fs_read_end_io IRQold data overrides new data due to out-of-order GC and common IO. -f2fs_read_end_io

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52682` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1030.31~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.11.0-1009.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1099-gcp - 4.10.0-1004.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1071-oracle - 4.15.0-1007.9~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
